docs.lead_paragraph: There was confusion at the Silk Exposition at the Grand Central Palace, yesterday afternoon when a water pipe burst in the booth of the Ribbon Committee on the second floor. The Ribbon Committee exhibit and that of Stehli Company adjoining and part of the exhibit of Cheney Brothers on the floor below were flooded.

headline.main: BOOTHS FLOODED AT SILK EXHIBITION; Bursting of Water Pipe Causes $5,000 Damage to Three Displays.
